textBeforeTable: Joystiq, saying Cliff Bleszinski followed this more concretely, saying: "Let me say that again: we are working on a PC game." After the panel Capps confirmed to them that this project is underway and that they currently plan on it being a PC exclusive, but no other details were offered. "We might be working on a PC-only title," said Epic's Mike Capps during a PAX East panel, reports [Apr 08, 2012, 1:53 pm ET] - Share - Viewing Comments Epic Making PC Exclusive Game --> Blue's News Favorite!
